General.Name: Shandong Shida Shenghua Chem
General.Description: Shinghwa Advanced Material Group Co.,ltd. engages in the production and sale of chemical products in China. Its products include methyl tert-butyl ether, propylene oxide, dimethyl carbonate, propylene carbonate, ethylene carbonate, ethyl methyl carbonate and other carbonate products, lithium hexafluorophosphate, and other products. The company was formerly known as Shandong Shida Shenghua Chemical Group Company Limited and changed its name to Shinghwa Advanced Material Group Co.,ltd. in September 2022. Shinghwa Advanced Material Group Co.,ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Dongying, China.
